roleset.name: coat with flour
roleset.note: FLOUR-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from flour.01-v)

example.name: Hands as Arg1
example.text: She floured her hands well, pinched off a biscuit-size piece of wet dough, and dipped it in the flour.

example.name: Dough as arg1
example.text: She floured the outside of the wet dough so that she could handle it.
example.arg: the outside of the wet dough
so that she could handle it.

example.name: ARGmprd and ARG2
example.text: I floured it with the flour in the old lard bucket and browned it just like you said
example.arg: with the flour in the old lard bucket
